price: U tome su, zaista, pouke, a Mi smo, doista, stavljali na kušnju.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
